keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.NoiseFilters.CVCommitteesFilter

Class PartitionScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Preprocess.NoiseFilters.CVCommitteesFilter.PartitionScheme

  • public class PartitionScheme
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements a stratified scheme (equal number of examples of each class in each partition) to partition a dataset

    Since:
    JDK1.6

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Jose A. Saez Munoz, research group SCI2S (Soft Computing and Intelligent Information Systems). DECSAI (DEpartment of Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence), University of Granada - Spain. Date: 06/01/10

      It reads the training set and creates the partitions
